MISSING DESCRIPTION
Valid values: MISSING POSSIBLE VALUES Default: Defined in namelist_defaults.xml

Method for interpolating tracer values from layer centers to layer edges
Valid values: 'spline' and 'stencil' Default: Defined in namelist_defaults.xml

Order of polynomial used for tracer reconstruction at layer edges
Valid values: 2, 3 and 4 Default: Defined in namelist_defaults.xml

Order of polynomial used for tracer reconstruction at cell edges
Valid values: 2, 3 and 4 Default: Defined in namelist_defaults.xml

Reconstruction of 3rd-order reconstruction to blend with 4th-order reconstuction
Valid values: any real between 0 and 1 Default: Defined in namelist_defaults.xml

If .true. then fluxes are limited to produce a monotonic advection scheme
Valid values: .true. and .false. Default: Defined in namelist_defaults.xml
